nodes.documentation:
@title Escrow contract, every project deploys a clone and transfer ownership to the project client, so all
       funds not reserved to pay for a milestone can be safely moved in/out.
nodes.name: DecoEscrow

nodes.documentation: @dev Default `payable` fallback to accept incoming ETH from any address.

blockFunds(uint256).details: Block funds for future use by authorized party stored in `authorizedAddress`.

params._amount: An uint of Wei to be blocked.

blockTokenFunds(address,uint256).details: Blocks ERC20 tokens funds for future use by authorized party listed in `authorizedAddress`.

params._amount: An uint of tokens to be blocked.

deposit().details: Accept and account incoming deposit in contract state.

depositErc20(address,uint256).details: Start transfering the given amount of the ERC20 tokens available by provided address.

params._amount: Amount to transfer from sender`s address.

distributeFunds(address,uint256).details: Distribute funds between contract`s balance and allowance for some address. Deposit may be returned back to the contract address, i.e. to the escrow owner. Or deposit may flow to the allowance for an address as a result of an evidence given by an authorized party about fullfilled obligations. **IMPORTANT** This operation includes fees deduction.

params._amount: Amount to distribute in favor of a destination address.

distributeTokenFunds(address,address,uin.details: Distribute ERC20 token funds between contract`s balance and allowanc for some address. Deposit may be returned back to the contract address, i.e. to the escrow owner. Or deposit may flow to the allowance for an address as a result of an evidence given by authorized party about fullfilled obligations. **IMPORTANT** This operation includes fees deduction.

params._amount: Amount to distribute in favor of a destination address.

getTokenWithdrawalAllowance(address,addr.details: Returns allowance for withdrawing the given token for sender address.

initialize(address,address,uint8,address.details: Initialize the Escrow clone with default values.

params._authorizedAddress: An address that will be stored as authorized.
params._newOwner: An address of a new escrow owner.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

isSyncNeededForToken(address).details: Helper to determine if sync of the balance for token is required.
isSyncNeededForToken(address).return: `true` if the real token balance is greater than stored one, otherwise  `false`.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setRelayContractAddress(address).details: Set the new address of the `DecoRelay` contract.

params._newAddress: An address of the new contract.

syncTokenBalance(address).details: Sync actual token balance, save to the storage, and reflect changes in `tokensBalance` mapping.     ERC20 tokens may be deployed directly to this contract address from anywhere and to make funds     available for distibution/blocking/withdrawing this method should be called to align stored     contact balance with the actual one.

transferAnyERC20Token(address,uint256).details: Override base contract logic to block this operation for Escrow contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unblockFunds(uint256).details: Unblock blocked funds and make them available to the contract owner.

params._amount: An uint of Wei to be unblocked.

unblockTokenFunds(address,uint256).details: Unblock blocked token funds and make them available to the contract owner.

params._amount: An uint of Wei to be unblocked.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw the given amount of ETH to sender`s address if allowance or contract balance is sufficient.

withdrawErc20(address,uint256).details: Withdraw the given amount of ERC20 token to sender`s address if allowance or contract balance is sufficient.

withdrawErc20ForAddress(address,address,.details: Withdraws ERC20 token amount from the contract's balance to the provided address.

params._amount: An `uint` amount of ERC20 tokens to be transfered.

withdrawForAddress(address,uint256).details: Withdraws ETH amount from the contract's balance to the provided address.

devdoc.title: Escrow contract, every project deploys a clone and transfer ownership to the project client, so all       funds not reserved to pay for a milestone can be safely moved in/out.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
